name: shell
description:
Runs a shell command inside the repository workspace.
Returns a JSON string: {"output":"...","metadata":{"exit_code":0,"duration_seconds":0.1}}.

Rules:
- Use shell only when {{tool:read}}/{{tool:ls}}/{{tool:glob}}/{{tool:grep}} are insufficient.
- Do not use shell to read files; use {{tool:read}} for file contents.
- Prefer explicit workdir; do not use cd unless necessary.
- Do not guess command output.
- Do not run tests unless the user explicitly asks.
- Default timeout is 30s; max timeout is 10 minutes.
